name: Ranma 1/2: Ougi Jaanken
overview: In a response to a challenge issued by the Gambling King that anyone who can beat him at a game of janken will earn a wish, Ranma and Genma Saotome, Akane Tendo, Ryoga Hibiki, Shampoo, Mousse head off to face him. There are two modes. In Story, one character must first defeat the other five before facing the Gambling King as the final boss. To defeat an opponent the player must win two matches against them. In Versus, players can choose from a variety options, including different handicaps.
